title: IT Consultant
description: We are seeking an experienced IT Consultant to assess client IT needs and develop strategic roadmaps for digital transformation projects. You will work closely with stakeholders to understand business objectives and recommend technology solutions that drive efficiency and growth.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Proven experience in IT strategy and consulting
Excellent communication and presentation skills
Knowledge of cloud computing (AWS/Azure) and enterprise architecture
Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
responsibilities: Analyze client business processes and identify areas for technology improvement
Develop comprehensive IT strategies and implementation roadmaps
Collaborate with technical teams to ensure successful project delivery
Provide expert advice on technology trends and best practices
Conduct risk assessments and recommend security enhancements
Facilitate workshops and training sessions for client teams

title: Help Desk Technician
description: Join our support team as a Help Desk Technician, providing technical assistance to clients and resolving IT-related issues efficiently. You will be the first point of contact for technical support, ensuring high customer satisfaction through timely and effective problem resolution.
requirements: Strong communication and analytical skills
Experience in technical support or help desk role
Knowledge of common software (Office 365, Windows) and hardware issues
Customer service oriented mindset
Basic networking knowledge (TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP)
Certification in CompTIA A+ or similar is a plus
responsibilities: Respond to user inquiries via phone, email, and ticketing system
Diagnose and resolve technical hardware and software issues
Install, configure, and upgrade PC software and operating systems
Document support activities and resolutions in the ticketing system
Escalate complex issues to senior technical staff as needed
Provide basic user training on hardware and software usage

title: Medical Transcriptionist
description: We are looking for skilled Medical Transcriptionists to convert audio recordings of medical dictations into accurate written reports. Accuracy and attention to detail are paramount in this role to ensure high-quality patient documentation.
requirements: Knowledge of medical terminology, anatomy, and physiology
Excellent typing skills (minimum 60 WPM) with high accuracy
Attention to detail and ability to spot errors
Healthcare background or certification in medical transcription
Good listening skills and familiarity with various accents
Proficiency with transcription software and tools
responsibilities: Listen to recorded dictations from healthcare professionals
Transcribe recordings into accurate medical reports and documents
Review and edit transcriptions for clarity and grammar
Ensure compliance with HIPAA regulations and patient confidentiality
Meet daily productivity and quality targets
Collaborate with quality assurance team for feedback and improvement

title: Software Developer
description: Seyyone is hiring talented Software Developers to design, develop, and maintain software applications using modern technologies. You will be part of an agile team building scalable solutions for our clients in healthcare and other industries.
requirements: Proficiency in programming languages (Java, Python, or JavaScript/TypeScript)
Experience with web development frameworks (React, Node.js, Spring Boot)
Strong understanding of database systems (SQL and NoSQL)
Familiarity with version control (Git) and CI/CD pipelines
Strong problem-solving abilities and logical thinking
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Engineering
responsibilities: Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code
Design and implement new features and functionality
Debug and resolve software defects and performance issues
Participate in code reviews and contribute to team knowledge sharing
Collaborate with designers and product managers to define requirements
Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry trends
